#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,i=1;
	cin>>t;
	
	while(t--)
	{
	    int n;
	    cin>>n;
	    int *a=new int [n];
	    if(a==NULL)
	    {
	        cout<<"LUL"<<endl;
	    }
	    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	    {
	        cin>>a[i];
	    }
	    sort(a,a+n);
	    cout<<"Case "<<i<<": "<<a[n-1]+a[n-2]+a[n-3]<<endl;
	    delete []a;
	    i++;
	}
}
